title: Is there a way to change the grid size on the Pixel Launcher to make the icons larger?
content: I like the overall size of the Pixel 3, but I have to make the icons and their text larger for my 53 year-old eyes.  I am currently getting pretty satisfactory results using the Nova launcher, but I would rather use the native Pixel launcher.  Some Nova-like customization of the grid size and icon text would go a long way...
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
